name: Demo Day Finalist: Dana and the Great Big World
name_original: Demo Day Finalist: Dana and the Great Big World
description:
Dana and the Great Big World by Kaiya J.

Game Summary:

Dana and the Great Big World is a 2D platformer, cooking game that explores food from around the world. The game follows Dana, a new to cooking chef and once picky eater, as she cooks dishes from different countries and cultures. The players will follow the steps from condensed recipes leading them to mini platform games where Dana will cut, fry, and bake food. Finish the platform levels successfully, avoiding hot oil, germs, and expired or rotten ingredients, to make the dish. Dana and the Great Big World will get up close and personal to cooking, as Dana will shrink to be a tiny chef and enter the world of cooking from a whole new perspective.

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right 

  • Press SPACE to progress through cutscenes and how to plays
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Click to interact with appliances in the kitchen
  • SPACE to jump in mini games
